wikipedia_page.main: George Harold Wheeler (19 February 1910 – 1995) was a Welsh amateur football left back who played in the Football League for Newport County. He was capped by Wales at amateur level.

response: *George Wheeler (explorer) (1842–1905), explorer and cartographer, leader of the Wheeler Survey
*George Wheeler (pinch hitter) (1881–1918), baseball player for 1910 Cincinnati Reds
